column2: People say that someone really, really scary lives right here in town, but I’ve never met anyone like that.
Have you met Miss Shantotto yet? She’s the best! She’s adorable, and elegant, and just plain wonderful!
I don’t know why this is all happening, but I do know we’ll all be safe here as long as Miss Shantotto is around!
Ahh... Just thinking about Miss Shantotto makes me happy. She’s so...wonderful!
